The Boy and the Heron.description: A young boy enters a mysterious world guided by a talking heron.

Your Name.description: Two strangers mysteriously swap bodies and try to find each other.

Howl's Moving Castle.description: A girl cursed by a witch finds refuge in a magical walking castle.

Suzume.description: Suzume helps close magical doors causing disasters across Japan.

Gundam Unicorn.description: A teen pilot discovers the power of the mysterious Unicorn Gundam.

FGO: Final Singularity.description: The Chaldea team faces the final battle to save humanity's future.

Demon Slayer: Mugen Train.description: Tanjiro and friends face a powerful demon aboard a haunted train.

Conan: The Million-dollar Pentagram.description: Conan faces off against a legendary thief in a battle of wits over a priceless sword.

Attack on Titan: The Last Attack.description: In a final stand, humanity battles to end the titan threat once and for all.

Fate\/stay night: Heaven's Feel.description: Dark secrets unfold as the Holy Grail War reaches its darkest path.

Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle.description: In this epic final battle, the slayers face off against the remaining Upper Rank demons in a visually stunning, high-stakes showdown between humanity and the forces of darkness.
